r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n:
This is a major update to the PHP 2.2 SDK.
Changes: * PCBC-360: refactoring to support PHP 7 * PCBC-376: reentrant transcoders * PCBC-369: allow to use system fastlz * PCBC-373: ensure view query values are properly url encoded * Various minor changes
